title: Definitions
context: [ยง88F-1] Definitions. As used in this chapter, unless the context clearly indicates otherwise: &ldquo;County&rdquo; means the counties of Honolulu, Hawaii, Kauai, and Maui. &ldquo;Employee&rdquo; means a part-time, temporary, seasonal or casual employee, as defined by rules of the board of trustees, who is not eligible to participate in the employees&rsquo; retirement system of the State under chapter 88. &ldquo;State&rdquo; means the State of Hawaii. [L 1996, c 212, pt of ยง2]
